about.title: About
about.subtitle: We help you learn English through adaptive content
about.description: WordFlow is a platform for creating and sharing content
about.missionText: WordFlow is an innovative platform for learning English that adapts content to your knowledge level. We believe that every person deserves a personalized approach to learning.
about.howItWorksText: Our system analyzes your current level of English proficiency and provides content that perfectly suits you. From basic phrases for beginners to complex idioms for advanced learners â€” we cover the entire spectrum of levels from A1 to C2.
about.personalizationText: Content adapts to your level and interests
about.varietyText: Articles on grammar, vocabulary, business English and much more
about.progressText: Track your progress and develop gradually
about.practicalityText: Real examples and situations from everyday life
about.teamText: We are a team of enthusiasts united by love for languages and technology. Our English language experts, methodologists and developers work together to create the best language learning experience.
about.joinUsText: Start your journey to fluent English today. Subscribe to our updates and receive new articles adapted to your level.
